biotools.summary: dbMTS is a comprehensive database of putative human microRNA target site (MTS) SNVs and their functional predictions. dbMTS collects all potential SNVs microRNA target seed regions in human 3’UTRs and provides their functional predictions and annotations to facilitate the steps of filtering and prioritizing SNVs from a huge list of all SNVs discovered in a whole exome sequencing (WES) study.
